RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy.description: Você se move rapidamente através de obstáculos, sejam eles pedras tombadas, matagal emaranhado ou lama fofa. Você pode ignorar os efeitos de terreno difícil não-mágico. Como padrão para ignorar terreno difícil, isto também lhe permite tratar os impedimentos de terreno difícil maior como se fossem impedimentos de terreno difícil.

RyOkmu0W9svavuAB.name: Mastermind Racket
RyOkmu0W9svavuAB.description:
Where others might use sleight of hand or a silver tongue to achieve their objectives, you rely on your intellect to craft intricate schemes. You likely view your operations as a chess game, always planning 10 steps ahead where others might plan three. You might be a detective determined to solve crimes or a spymaster in the service of a powerful family or nation. If you operate outside the law, you might be an aspiring crime lord or information broker, excellent at directing others toward suitable jobs.

If you successfully identify a creature using @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge}, that creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute.

You're trained in Society and one of the following skills of your choice: Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion. You can choose Intelligence as your key ability score.

S6WW4Yyg4XonXGHD.name: Conjuração Arcana
S6WW4Yyg4XonXGHD.description:
Através de estudo dedicado e prática intensiva, você consegue manipular o poder arcano para conjurar magias. Você pode conjurar magias arcanas usando a atividade @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Conjurar uma Magia} e pode providenciar componentes materiais, somáticos e verbais quando conjurar magias.

No 1º nível, a cada manhã você pode preparar duas magias de 1º nível e cinco truques mágicos dentre as opções disponíveis em seu grimório. Se for um mago especialista, você pode preparar magias adicionais da escola de magia escolhida, sendo um truque mágico e uma magia a cada nível de magia que seja capaz de conjurar. Magias preparadas permanecem disponíveis até você conjurá-las ou preparar suas magias novamente. A quantidade de magias que você pode preparar é chamada de espaços de magia.

Conforme avança de nível como mago, a quantidade de magias que você pode preparar por dia aumenta, assim como o maior nível de magia que você é capaz de conjurar.

SB8UJ8rZmvbcBweJ.name: Powerful Fist
SB8UJ8rZmvbcBweJ.description: You know how to wield your fists as deadly weapons. The damage die for your fist increases to 1d6 instead of 1d4. Most people take a -2 circumstance penalty when making a lethal attack with nonlethal unarmed attacks, because they find it hard to use their fists with deadly force. You don't take this penalty when making a lethal attack with your fist or any other unarmed attacks.

SCYSjUbMmw8JD9P9.name: Superstition Instinct
SCYSjUbMmw8JD9P9.description:
A deep distrust of magic drives you to forgo and counter the metaphysical nonsense of spellcasters. Whether you're a member of a superstitious family or culture that distrusts magic, a warrior in constant battle against wizards and witches, a survivor of a magical accident that instilled an intense aversion in your mind and body, or a scion of a bloodline known for its magic resistance, your rage is inimical to magic.

This makes you an excellent mage hunter but slow to trust practitioners of magical arts. Your extremely restrictive anathema grants you powers beyond those of other instincts.

Anathema

Willingly accepting the effects of magic spells (including from scrolls, wands, and the like), even from your allies, is anathema to your instinct. You can still drink potions and invest and activate most magic items you find, though items that cast spells are subject to the same restrictions as all other spells. If an ally insists on using magic on you despite your unwillingness, and you have no reason to believe they will stop, continuing to travel with that ally of your own free will counts as willingly accepting their spells (as do similar circumstances) and thus is also anathema to your instinct.

Superstitious Resiliance (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you gain a +2 status bonus to all saves against magic. Increase your damage from Rage from 2 to 4 against creatures that can cast spells. Once every 10 minutes, when you Rage, you regain Hit Points equal to the temporary Hit Points you gain from that Rage action.

Specialization Ability 7th

Increase the damage from Rage from 4 to 8 against creatures that can cast spells. If you have greater raging specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage to 12 against creatures with spells and 8 against other creatures.

Raging Resistance 9th

Choose two associated magical traditions: arcane and occult, arcane and primal, divine and occult, or divine and primal. The resistance from your raging resistance class feature applies against all damage you take from spells cast with these two traditions of magic, regardless of the type of damage dealt by the spell.

SHpjmM4A3Sw4GgDz.name: Light Armor Mastery (Level 19)
SHpjmM4A3Sw4GgDz.description: Your skill with light armor improves, increasing your ability to dodge blows. Your proficiency ranks for light armor and unarmored defense increase to master.

SNZ46g3u7U6x0XJj.name: Tese Arcana: Sintonização com Familiar Aprimorada
SNZ46g3u7U6x0XJj.description: Você insiste há muito tempo que uma afinação sutil da mágica que liga mago e familiar pode aprimorar imensamente essa conexão mística, especialmente comparada ao elo seguro e genérico usado pela maioria dos magos. Você formou um pacto desses com seu familiar, recebendo mais vantagens dessa ligação do que a maioria dos magos. Você recebe o talento de mago @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bcxIg7wi8ZAhvhOD]{Familiar} como um talento bônus. Seu familiar recebe uma habilidade extra e uma habilidade extra adicional quando você alcançar o 6º, 12º e 18º níveis. Sua forte conexão com seu familiar altera sua característica de classe elo arcano, permitindo que você armazene sua energia mágica em seu familiar em vez de num item. Você também recebe a ação livre Drenar Familiar em vez da ação Drenar Item Ligado. Drenar Familiar funciona da mesma forma e nos mesmos momentos que Drenar Item Ligado, exceto que você drena a magia de seu familiar em vez de um item.

SNeVaUBTHwvoO6kr.name: Escola Arcana: Conjuração
SNeVaUBTHwvoO6kr.description: Como um conjurador, você convoca criaturas e objetos de locais longínquos, e utiliza sua magia para transportar-se para locais distantes. Você compreende que a verdadeira chave para o sucesso está em superar a quantidade de inimigos. Você adiciona uma magia de conjuração de 1º nível (como @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{convocar animal}) ao seu grimório. Você aprende a magia de escola @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tWzxuJdbXqvskdIo]{convocação aumentada}.

SOan0fqyFTrkqJLV.name: Witch Lessons
SOan0fqyFTrkqJLV.description:
A witch's knowledge from their patron comes in the form of lessons, which you can learn by selecting feats like Basic Lesson. Each lesson grants you a hex and teaches your familiar a new spell, adding it to the spells you can prepare using your witch spellcasting. You gain this spell even if it's not on your tradition's spell list.

BASIC LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or another effect grants you a basic lesson.

Lesson of Dreams: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NNoKWiWKqJkdD2ln]{Veil of Dreams} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}.

Lesson of the Elements: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f9uqHnNBMU0774SF]{Elemental Betrayal} hex. Your familiar learns your choice of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.y6rAdMK6EFlV6U0t]{Burning Hands}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.W69zswpj0Trdy5rj]{Air Bubble}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Rn2LkoSq1XhLsODV]{Pummeling Rubble}.

Lesson of Life: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fAlzXtQAASaJx0mY]{Life Boost} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link}.

Lesson of Protection: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dFejDNEmVj3CwYLL]{Blood Ward} hex; your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}.

Lesson of Vengeance: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aEitTTb9PnOyidRf]{Needle of Vengeance} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}.

GREATER LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or other effect grants you a greater lesson.

Lesson of Mischief: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FrKPwgFxWIGMGgs4]{Deceiver's Cloak} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tFKJCPvOQZxKq6ON]{Mad Monkeys}.

Lesson of Shadow: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vhMCd15ZwNJn0zen]{Malicious Shadow} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sRfSBHWHdbIa0aGc]{Chilling Darkness}.

Lesson of Snow: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g4MAIQodRDVfNp1B]{Personal Blizzard} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind}.

MAJOR LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or other effect grants you a major lesson.

Lesson of Death: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.nQS4vPm5zprqkzFZ]{Curse of Death} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead}.

Lesson of Renewal: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pCvJ4yoZJxDtgUMI]{Restorative Moment} hex, and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x5rGOmhDRDVQPrnW]{Field of Life}.

Lesson of Baba Yaga [RARE]: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZyREiMaul0VhDYh3]{Glacial Heart} hex and your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R5FHRv7VqyRnxg2t]{Wall of Ice}.

SUUdWG0t33VKa5q4.name: Master Strike
SUUdWG0t33VKa5q4.description: You can incapacitate an unwary foe with a single strike. Your proficiency rank for your rogue class DC increases to master. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Rlp7ND33yYfxiEWi]{Master Strike} free action.

T1061bjnCQWSfWJX.name: Life Mystery (Multiclass)
T1061bjnCQWSfWJX.description:
The never-ending flow of positive energy within living beings is palpable to you. You might uphold the sanctity of life, or perhaps you seek to undermine it. You might draw power from the collective vitality of the world's living creatures, hold some connection to the Positive Energy Plane, or revere a collection of deities including Irori, Pharasma, Sarenrae, and the god of medicine Qi Zhong.

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

T25ZLQWn6O4KchLo.name: Magias de Foco
T25ZLQWn6O4KchLo.description:
Magias de foco são um tipo especial de magia obtida diretamente de um ramo de estudo, de uma divindade ou de outra fonte específica. Você pode aprender magias de foco apenas através de características ou talentos especiais de classe em vez de escolhê-las de uma lista de magia. Além disso, você pode conjurar magias de foco utilizando um reservatório especial de Pontos de Foco — você não prepara uma magia de foco em um espaço de magia ou usa seus espaços de magia para conjurar magias de foco; da mesma forma, você não pode gastar seus Pontos de Foco para conjurar magias que não sejam magias de foco. Mesmo algumas classes que normalmente não concedem conjuração, como campeão e monge, podem fornecer magias de foco.

Magias de foco são automaticamente elevadas até a metade de seu nível arredondada para cima, assim como truques mágicos. Você não pode conjurar uma magia de foco se o nível mínimo dela for maior do que a metade de seu nível arredondada para cima, mesmo que obtenha acesso a ela de alguma forma.

Conjurar qualquer uma de suas magias de foco custa 1 Ponto de Foco. Você automaticamente adquire uma reserva de foco de 1 Ponto de Foco na primeira vez que ganhar uma habilidade que lhe fornecer uma magia de foco.

Você recupera todos os Pontos de Foco em sua reserva de foco durante suas preparações diárias. Você também pode usar a atividade Refocar para orar, estudar, meditar ou de alguma outra forma ressintonizar-se com a fonte da sua magia de foco, recuperando um Ponto de Foco.

Algumas habilidades lhe permitem aumentar os Pontos de Foco em sua reserva acima de 1. Tipicamente, isto ocorre através de talentos que lhe concedem uma nova magia de foco e aumentam a quantidade de pontos em sua reserva em 1. Sua reserva de foco nunca pode ter uma capacidade além de 3 Pontos de Foco, mesmo se selecionar talentos que aumentariam sua reserva acima deste valor.

Recuperar Pontos de Foco, veja a ação @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocar}.

Conjuradores com Magias de Foco

FonteLivro Básico pág. 302
Se for um conjurador, suas magias de foco são da mesma tradição de magia que a classe que lhe forneceu essas magias de foco. As magias de foco de um bardo são @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.fEOj0eOBe34qYdAa]{ocultistas}, as de um clérigo são @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.AvNbdGSOTWNRgcxs]{divinas}, as de um druida são @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.b8pnRxGuNzG0buuh]{primais}, as de um mago são @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.S6WW4Yyg4XonXGHD]{arcanas} e as de um feiticeiro são determinadas por sua linhagem.

Não-conjuradores com Magias de Foco

FonteLivro Básico pág. 302
Se você recebe magias de foco de uma classe ou outra fonte que não concede habilidades de conjuração (como um monge com o talento @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3a07jkWezSuORSpS]{Golpe de Ki}), a habilidade que fornece magias de foco também fornece sua graduação de proficiência para ataques de magia e CDs de magia, assim como a tradição mágica de suas magias de foco. Você adquire a habilidade de @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Conjurar uma Magia} e usar quaisquer ações de conjuração necessárias para conjurar suas magias de foco. Entretanto, você não se qualifica para talentos e outras regras que requeiram que você seja um conjurador.

TAIOtk5VvPZvv4nu.name: Prontidão (Nível 9)
TAIOtk5VvPZvv4nu.description: A experiência lhe tornou incrivelmente alerta às ameaças ao seu redor, e você reage mais rapidamente ao perigo. Sua graduação de proficiência em Percepção aumenta para especialista.

TIvzBALymvb56L79.name: Battlefield Surveyor
TIvzBALymvb56L79.description: Whether taking stock of an enemy army or simply standing guard, you excel at observing your foes. Your proficiency rank for Perception increases to master. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks for initiative, making you faster to react during combat.

TQqv9Q5mB4PW6LH9.name: Spirit Instinct
TQqv9Q5mB4PW6LH9.description:
Whether you are emotionally sensitive to the spirits around you; worship ancestors or apparitions; or are haunted by the specter of an ancestor, relative, friend, or foe, your rage takes the form of a spiritual possession.

Anathema

Disrespecting corpses or spirits is anathema to your instinct; defending yourself against undead creatures is not.

Spirit Rage (Instinct Ability)

When raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 3 and change its damage type to negative or positive, instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack (choose each time you Rage). If you choose to deal negative or positive damage, your weapon or unarmed attack gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune, which makes it more effective against incorporeal creatures, and your Rage action gains the divine and necromancy traits, plus negative or positive, as appropriate.

Specialization Ability

When using spirit rage, increase the damage from Rage from 3 to 7. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage when using spirit rage to 13.

Raging Resistance

You resist negative damage, as well as damage dealt by the attacks and abilities of undead creatures, regardless of the damage type.

TUOeATt52P43r5W0.name: Reflexos Rápidos (Nível 3)
TUOeATt52P43r5W0.description: Seus reflexos são rápidos como um relâmpago. Sua graduação de proficiência em salvamentos de Reflexos aumenta para especialista.

TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ.name: Bloodline: Phoenix
TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ.description:
You have been blessed by a phoenix, perhaps via some magical interaction with a similarly blessed individual. Grant this new sorcerer bloodline to players who finish the Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Adventure Path. Players can then choose this bloodline for any new sorcerer characters they create for future campaigns.

Spell List primal

Bloodline Skills Diplomacy, Nature

Granted Spells cantrip: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}; 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.y6rAdMK6EFlV6U0t]{Burning Hands}; 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}; 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}; 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life}; 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}; 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WG91Z5TiR6oO5FOw]{Contingency}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4MOew29Z1oCX8O28]{Moment of Renewal}; 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jrBa9deU2ULFWvSl]{Meteor Swarm}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lZx8jZfKrMEtyGY0]{Rejuvenating Flames}; advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Q1OWufw6dUiY8yEI]{Shroud of Flame}; greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tf4PMMMzR5xxJDun]{Cleansing Flames}

Blood Magic The primal fire of life and death flows through you or one target. Choose to have either you or a target of the spell gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level for 1 round, or to have a target of the spell take fire damage equal to the spell's level (if the spell already deals initial fire damage, combine this with the spell's initial damage before determining weaknesses and resistances).

TuL0UfqH14MtqYVh.name: Greater Juggernaut
TuL0UfqH14MtqYVh.description: You have a stalwart physiology. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to legendary. When you roll a critical failure on a Fortitude save, you get a failure instead. When you roll a failure on a Fortitude save against an effect that deals damage, you halve the damage you take.

U74JoAcLHTOsZG6q.name: Swashbuckler Expertise
U74JoAcLHTOsZG6q.description: You perform swashbuckling techniques with exceptional flair, making them harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your swashbuckler class DC increases to expert.

UIHUNNYZyQ3p4Vmo.name: Interrogation Methodology
UIHUNNYZyQ3p4Vmo.description:
People can't help but trust you, whether through your inherent likableness or your firm insistence on sticking to the truth. You have a way about you that gets others talking, and you've developed interrogative techniques to help you get to the truth of your investigations.

You are trained in Diplomacy. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6ON8DjFXSMITZleX]{No Cause For Alarm} skill feat. You can also @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} over the course of a conversation rather than spending dedicated time looking into the lead, provided the conversation lasts 1 minute or longer. For example, while trying to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, you could pursue the creature you're conversing with as a lead, and you could Pursue a Lead about an object while someone is telling you information about that object. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xccOiNL2W1EtfUYl]{Pointed Question} action.

UTRDN1TAieBMjwP1.name: Order of the Godclaw
UTRDN1TAieBMjwP1.description:
Favored Weapon: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5fu6dCtqhdBnHNqh]{Morningstar}

The Order of the Godclaw’s Hellknights see their cause as a holy mandate from the Godclaw. They seek to punish criminals with a zeal rarely matched by others who enforce the law.

Lesser Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UHejQS4uCNGRI45t]{Dedication to the Five}

Greater Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cMkpLgadlLCzDOv0]{Blessings of the Five}

UV1HlClbWCNcaKBZ.name: Anátema (Sacerdote)
UV1HlClbWCNcaKBZ.description:
Acts fundamentally opposed to your deity's alignment or ideals are anathema to your faith. Learning or casting spells, committing acts, and using items that are anathema to your deity remove you from your deity's good graces.

Casting spells with the evil trait is almost always anathema to good deities, and casting good spells is likewise anathema to evil deities; similarly, casting chaotic spells is anathema to lawful deities, and casting lawful spells is anathema to chaotic deities. A neutral cleric who worships a neutral deity isn't limited this way, but their alignment might change over time if they frequently cast spells or use abilities with a certain alignment. Similarly, casting spells that are anathema to the tenets or goals of your faith could interfere with your connection to your deity. For example, casting a spell to create undead would be anathema to @Compendium[pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Pharasma}, the goddess of death. For borderline cases, you and your GM determine which acts are anathema.

If you perform enough acts that are anathema to your deity, or if your alignment changes to one not allowed by your deity, you lose the magical abilities that come from your connection to your deity. The class features that you lose are determined by the GM, but they likely include your divine font and all divine spellcasting. These abilities can be regained only if you demonstrate your repentance by conducting an @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual.

UyuwFp0jQqYL2AdF.name: Redeemer
UyuwFp0jQqYL2AdF.description:
You're full of kindness and forgiveness. You gain the Glimpse of Redemption champion's reaction and the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} devotion spell. After the tenets of good, add these:

  • You must first try to redeem those who commit evil acts, rather than killing them or meting out punishment. If they then continue on a wicked path, you might need to take more extreme measures.
  • You must show compassion for others, regardless of their authority or station.

Champion's Reaction

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption} R

Trigger An enemy damages your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you.

Your foe hesitates under the weight of sin as visions of redemption play in their mind's eye. The foe must choose one of the following options:

  • The ally is unharmed by the triggering damage.
  • The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. After the damaging effect is applied, the enemy becomes enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn.

Divine SmiteLevel 9

A guilty conscience assails foes who spurn your Glimpse of Redemption. A foe that responds to your Glimpse of Redemption by dealing damage takes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Good Damage} equal to your Charisma modifier.

ExaltLevel 11

You protect multiple allies. You can apply the resistance granted by Glimpse of Redemption to yourself and all allies within 15 feet of you, including the triggering ally, except the resistance is reduced by 2 for all.

V4Jt7eDnJBLv5bDj.name: Field Discovery (Mutagenist)
V4Jt7eDnJBLv5bDj.description: When using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} to make mutagens during your daily preparations, you can use a batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{reagents} to create any three mutagens instead of just two of the same mutagen.

VDot7CDcXElxmkkz.name: Instinto do Dragão
VDot7CDcXElxmkkz.description:
Você convoca o furor de um dragão poderoso e manifesta habilidades incríveis. Talvez sua cultura reverencie a majestade dracônica, ou talvez você tenha ganhado sua conexão ao beber ou banhar-se no sangue de um dragão ou após observar um ancião saqueador queimando sua vila. Selecione um tipo de dragão da Tabela 3–4: Instintos de Dragão como o tipo de dragão de seu instinto. Dragões cromáticos tendem a ser malignos, e dragões metálicos tendem a ser bondosos.

TABELA 3–4: INSTINTOS DE DRAGÃO

Dragão Tipo Sopro
Negro Cromático Linha de ácido
Azul Cromático Linha de eletricidade
Verde Cromático Cone de veneno
Vermelho Cromático Cone de fogo
Branco Cromático Cone de frio
Latão Metálico Linha de fogo
Bronze Metálico Linha de eletricidade
Cobre Metálico Linha de ácido
Ouro Metálico Cone de fogo
Prata Metálico Cone de frio

Anátema

Aceitar um insulto pessoal contra você é anátema a seu instinto. Escolha se seu personagem respeita ou abomina seu tipo de dragão. Se o respeitar, desafiar um dragão desses é anátema — se o abominar, fracassar em derrotar um dragão desses que cruzou o seu caminho é um anátema para você.

Fúria Dracônica (Habilidade de Instinto)

Quando estiver em Fúria, você pode aumentar o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 2 para 4 pontos e alterar seu tipo de dano para corresponder com o tipo do sopro de seu dragão em vez do tipo de dano de sua arma ou ataque desarmado. Se fizer isto, sua ação de Fúria adquire os traços arcano e evocação, assim como o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano.

Habilidade de Especialização

Quando usar fúria dracônica, você aumenta o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 4 para 8 pontos. Se tiver especialização em armas maior, aumente o dano de sua Fúria quando usar fúria dracônica de 8 para 16 pontos.

Resistência em Fúria

Você resiste a dano perfurante e ao tipo de dano do sopro de seu dragão.

VKRjmXxBFLrJK01c.name: Signature Spells (Level 3)
VKRjmXxBFLrJK01c.description:
Experience enables you to cast some spells more flexibly.

For each spell level you have access to, choose one spell of that level to be a signature spell. You don't need to learn heightened versions of signature spells separately; instead, you can heighten these spells freely. If you've learned a signature spell at a higher level than its minimum, you can also cast all its lower-level versions without learning those separately. If you swap out a signature spell, you can replace it with any spell you could have chosen when you first selected it (i.e., of the same spell level or lower).

You can also retrain specifically to change a signature spell to a different spell of that level without swapping any spells; this takes as much time as retraining a spell normally does.

VLiT503OLOM3vaDx.name: Devastator
VLiT503OLOM3vaDx.description: Your Strikes are so devastating that you hardly care about resistance, and your barbarian abilities are unparalleled. Your proficiency rank for your barbarian class DC increases to master. Your melee Strikes ignore 10 points of a creature's resistance to their physical damage.

VNbDNiWjARtGQQAs.name: Instinto do Dragão Negro
VNbDNiWjARtGQQAs.description:
Você convoca o furor de um dragão poderoso e manifesta habilidades incríveis. Talvez sua cultura reverencie a majestade dracônica, ou talvez você tenha ganhado sua conexão ao beber ou banhar-se no sangue de um dragão ou após observar um ancião saqueador queimando sua vila. Selecione um tipo de dragão da Tabela 3–4: Instintos de Dragão como o tipo de dragão de seu instinto. Dragões cromáticos tendem a ser malignos, e dragões metálicos tendem a ser bondosos.

TABELA 3–4: INSTINTOS DE DRAGÃO

Dragão Tipo Sopro
Negro Cromático Linha de ácido
Azul Cromático Linha de eletricidade
Verde Cromático Cone de veneno
Vermelho Cromático Cone de fogo
Branco Cromático Cone de frio
Latão Metálico Linha de fogo
Bronze Metálico Linha de eletricidade
Cobre Metálico Linha de ácido
Ouro Metálico Cone de fogo
Prata Metálico Cone de frio

Anátema

Aceitar um insulto pessoal contra você é anátema a seu instinto. Escolha se seu personagem respeita ou abomina seu tipo de dragão. Se o respeitar, desafiar um dragão desses é anátema — se o abominar, fracassar em derrotar um dragão desses que cruzou o seu caminho é um anátema para você.

Fúria Dracônica (Habilidade de Instinto)

Quando estiver em Fúria, você pode aumentar o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 2 para 4 pontos e alterar seu tipo de dano para corresponder com o tipo do sopro de seu dragão em vez do tipo de dano de sua arma ou ataque desarmado. Se fizer isto, sua ação de Fúria adquire os traços arcano e evocação, assim como o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano.

Habilidade de Especialização

Quando usar fúria dracônica, você aumenta o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 4 para 8 pontos. Se tiver especialização em armas maior, aumente o dano de sua Fúria quando usar fúria dracônica de 8 para 16 pontos.

Resistência em Fúria

Você resiste a dano perfurante e ao tipo de dano do sopro de seu dragão.

VS5vkqUQu4n7E28Y.name: Perpetual Potency (Chirurgeon)
VS5vkqUQu4n7E28Y.description:
Você aprimora suas infusões perpétuas, conseguindo usar @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Alquimia Rápida} para criar itens mais poderosos sem custo. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AJ1dC7EtTIfBey0M]{Antídoto} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.biRbqKo2C97XLfQ0]{Antipeste} moderado.

VVMMJdIWL7fAsQf3.name: Baba Yaga Patron
VVMMJdIWL7fAsQf3.description:
Baba Yaga teaches you how to transfer spirits into objects and freeze your foes.

Spell List occult

Patron Skill Occultism

Hex Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yp4w9SG4RuqRM8KD]{Spirit Object}

Granted Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}

VgZIutWjFl8oZQFi.name: Expert Strikes
VgZIutWjFl8oZQFi.description: You've practiced martial arts and have now surpassed your former skill. Your proficiency ranks for unarmed attacks and simple weapons increase to expert.

VgmfNKtQLgBaNi5r.name: Champion Expertise
VgmfNKtQLgBaNi5r.description: Prayers strengthen your divine power. Your proficiency ranks for your champion class DC and divine spell attack rolls and DCs increase to expert.

W1FkMHYVDg3yTU5r.name: Double Debilitation
W1FkMHYVDg3yTU5r.description: Your opportunistic attacks are particularly detrimental. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}, you can apply two debilitations simultaneously; removing one removes both.

W2rwudMNcAxs8VoX.name: Improved Flexibility
W2rwudMNcAxs8VoX.description: Your extensive experience gives you even greater ability to adapt to each day's challenges. When you use combat flexibility, you can gain two fighter feats instead of one. While the first feat must still be 8th level or lower, the second feat can be up to 14th level, and you can use the first feat to meet the prerequisites of the second feat. You must meet all of the feats' prerequisites.

W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY.name: Tempest Mystery
W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY.description:
The fury of the wind and waves pounds in your heart, whether your power flows from natural storms, a conduit to the elemental Planes of Air and Water, or through reverence of deities such as Gozreh, the tengu god of storms Hei Feng, the demon lord Dagon, or the elemental lords of air and water.

Mystery Benefit

You can see perfectly through wind and water, and you send electric charges through both air and water. You never take penalties to Perception from wind, rain, fog, or other precipitation, or from looking through water or being underwater, and such conditions don't cause anything to be concealed from you.

When you deal physical damage with a non-cantrip air or water spell, you deal an additional 1 electricity damage per spell level.

Trained Skill Nature

Granted Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}

Revelation Spells

  • Initial @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EzB9i7R6aBRAtJCh]{Tempest Touch};
  • Advanced @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LFSwMtQVP05EzlZe]{Thunderburst};
  • Greater @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Related Domains Air, Water

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a 5-foot emanation around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.IvXLHQySVNj4qMOi]{Effect: Minor Tempest Curse}

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a 10-foot emanation and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.fyuZlKJ4N0zScltj]{Effect: Moderate Tempest Curse}

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a 15-foot emanation and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you, including with a touch spell or a melee unarmed attack, takes [[/r 1d6 #electricity]] electricity damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.jB6iDPaOSWrgxsEh]{Effect: Major Tempest Curse}

WZUCvxqbigXos1L9.name: Fúria
WZUCvxqbigXos1L9.description:
Requirements You aren’t fatigued or raging.

Grants @Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall unconscious, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can Seek while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

WiM7X4xmpMx4s6LD.name: Weapon Specialization (Level 7)
WiM7X4xmpMx4s6LD.description: You've learned how to inflict greater injuries with the weapons you know best. You deal 2 additional damage with weapons and unarmed attacks in which you are an expert. This damage increases to 3 if you're a master, and to 4 if you're legendary.

XFTWJO6txmLNRLae.name: Night Patron
XFTWJO6txmLNRLae.description:
Your patron speaks from the shadows, granting you power over darkness and dreams.

Spell List occult

Patron Skill Occultism

Hex Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.cE7PRAX8Up7fmYef]{Shroud of Night}

Granted Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}

XPPG7nN9pxt0sjMg.name: Formula Book
XPPG7nN9pxt0sjMg.description:
An alchemist keeps meticulous formulas for every item they can create. You start with a standard @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qCEOZ6109Yo34tRx]{Formula Book (Blank)} worth 10 sp or less for free. The formula book contains the formulas for two common 1st-level alchemical items of your choice, in addition to those you gained from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} and your research field.

Each time you gain a level, you can add the formulas for two common alchemical items to your formula book. These new formulas can be for any level of item you can create. You learn these formulas automatically, but it's also possible to find or buy additional formulas in settlements or from other alchemists, or to invent them with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XR95taODq1sq82Du]{Inventor} feat.

XZnPwZ0ohlDXlFea.name: Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude)
XZnPwZ0ohlDXlFea.description:
Você descobriu como encontrar a perfeição em cada sucesso.

Escolha uma jogada de salvamento diferente da escolhida em seu caminho para a perfeição. Sua graduação de proficiência para a jogada de salvamento escolhida aumenta para mestre. Quando rolar um sucesso no salvamento escolhido, trate o resultado como um sucesso crítico.

YByJ9O7oe8wxfbqs.name: Perpetual Perfection (Chirurgeon)
YByJ9O7oe8wxfbqs.description:
Você aperfeiçoou suas infusões perpétuas, permitindo-lhe usar @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Alquimia Rápida} para criar itens ainda mais poderosos sem custo. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antídoto} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ORDaAzMZLrf6Hn8A]{Antipeste} maior.

YMBsi4bndRAk5CX4.name: Maestro Muse
YMBsi4bndRAk5CX4.description: Your muse is a virtuoso, inspiring you to greater heights. If it's a creature, it might be a performance-loving creature such as a choral angel or lillend azata; if a deity, it might be @Compendium[pf2e.deities.gxwmzxUWBOhdgFSN]{Shelyn}. As a bard with a maestro muse, you are an inspiration to your allies and confident of your musical and oratorical abilities. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sVjATEo8eqkAosNp]{Lingering Composition} feat and add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe} to your spell repertoire.

YrJj8UI0XpkHv0Ho.name: Order of the Chain
YrJj8UI0XpkHv0Ho.description:
Members of the Order of the Chain are skilled at hunting down and capturing criminals, especially those who dare flee from justice.

Lesser Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AGiIjgLOFuahmwiT]{Shackles of Law}

Greater Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XOAtP64xiSRIofsY]{Sturdy Bindings}

Z2eWkfXblU0QxFx1.name: Instinto do Dragão de Prata
Z2eWkfXblU0QxFx1.description:
Você convoca o furor de um dragão poderoso e manifesta habilidades incríveis. Talvez sua cultura reverencie a majestade dracônica, ou talvez você tenha ganhado sua conexão ao beber ou banhar-se no sangue de um dragão ou após observar um ancião saqueador queimando sua vila. Selecione um tipo de dragão da Tabela 3–4: Instintos de Dragão como o tipo de dragão de seu instinto. Dragões cromáticos tendem a ser malignos, e dragões metálicos tendem a ser bondosos.

TABELA 3–4: INSTINTOS DE DRAGÃO

Dragão Tipo Sopro
Negro Cromático Linha de ácido
Azul Cromático Linha de eletricidade
Verde Cromático Cone de veneno
Vermelho Cromático Cone de fogo
Branco Cromático Cone de frio
Latão Metálico Linha de fogo
Bronze Metálico Linha de eletricidade
Cobre Metálico Linha de ácido
Ouro Metálico Cone de fogo
Prata Metálico Cone de frio

Anátema

Aceitar um insulto pessoal contra você é anátema a seu instinto. Escolha se seu personagem respeita ou abomina seu tipo de dragão. Se o respeitar, desafiar um dragão desses é anátema — se o abominar, fracassar em derrotar um dragão desses que cruzou o seu caminho é um anátema para você.

Fúria Dracônica (Habilidade de Instinto)

Quando estiver em Fúria, você pode aumentar o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 2 para 4 pontos e alterar seu tipo de dano para corresponder com o tipo do sopro de seu dragão em vez do tipo de dano de sua arma ou ataque desarmado. Se fizer isto, sua ação de Fúria adquire os traços arcano e evocação, assim como o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano.

Habilidade de Especialização

Quando usar fúria dracônica, você aumenta o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 4 para 8 pontos. Se tiver especialização em armas maior, aumente o dano de sua Fúria quando usar fúria dracônica de 8 para 16 pontos.

Resistência em Fúria

Você resiste a dano perfurante e ao tipo de dano do sopro de seu dragão.

Z7HX6TeFsaup7Dx9.name: Greater Weapon Specialization (Level 15)
Z7HX6TeFsaup7Dx9.description: The weapons you've mastered become truly fearsome in your hands. Your damage from weapon specialization increases to 4 with weapons and unarmed attacks in which you're an expert, 6 if you're a master, and 8 if you're legendary.

ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp.name: Bloodline: Imperial
ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp.description:
One of your ancestors was a mortal who mastered magic. Such magical blood can remain latent for generations, but in you it manifested in full.

Spell List arcane

Bloodline Skills Arcana, Society

Granted Spells cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Prying Eye}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PngDCmU0MXZkbu0v]{Prismatic Sphere}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GxxnhRIaoGKtu1iO]{Extend Spell}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.h47yv6j6x1pUtzlr]{Arcane Countermeasure}

Blood Magic A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.vguxP8ukwVTWWWaA]{Effect: Imperial Blood Magic}

ZHabYxSgYK0XbjhM.name: Bloodline: Draconic
ZHabYxSgYK0XbjhM.description:
The blood of dragons flows through your veins. These beasts are both fearsome in combat and skilled at magic

Spell List arcane

Bloodline Skills Arcana, Intimidation

Granted Spells cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tgIhRUFtgDSELpJE]{Spell Immunity}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.forsqeofEszBNtLq]{Chromatic Wall}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.iL6TujgTCtRRa0Y0]{Prismatic Wall}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{Overwhelming Presence}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{Dragon Breath}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}

Blood Magic Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.FNTTeJHiK6iOjrSq]{Effect: Draconic Blood Magic}

Dragon Type

At 1st level, choose the type of dragon that influenced your bloodline. You can't change your dragon type later. This affects how some of your bloodline spells function.

The good metallic dragons and their damage types are brass (fire), bronze (electricity), copper (acid), gold (fire), and silver (cold).

The evil chromatic dragons and their damage types are black (acid), blue (electricity), green (poison), red (fire), and white (cold).

ZHwGACWQEy6kTzcP.name: Arcane School: Enchantment
ZHwGACWQEy6kTzcP.description: As an enchanter, you use magic to manipulate others' minds. You might use your abilities to subtly influence others or seize control over them. You understand that the mind surpasses matter. You add one 1st-level enchantment spell (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}) to your spellbook. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KMFRKzNCq7hVNH7H]{Charming Words} school spell.

ZZzLMOUAtBVgV1DF.name: Sacerdote Enclausurado
ZZzLMOUAtBVgV1DF.description:
Você é um clérigo membro do sacerdócio, focando em magias divinas e em sua conexão com os domínios de sua divindade.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.aiwxBj5MjnafCMyn]{Primeira Doutrina (1º Nível)}: Você recebe o talento de clérigo @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Iniciado no Domínio}.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sa7BWfnyCswAvBVa]{Segunda Doutrina (3º Nível)}: Sua graduação de proficiência em salvamentos de Fortitude aumenta para especialista.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.s8WEmc4GGZSHSC7q]{Terceira Doutrina (7º Nível)}: Suas graduações de proficiência em ataques de magia e CDs de magias divinas aumentam para especialista.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vxOf4LXZcqUG3P7a]{Quarta Doutrina (11º Nível)}: Suas graduações de proficiência na arma favorita de sua divindade, em armas simples e ataques desarmados aumentam para especialista. Quando obtiver um sucesso crítico em uma rolagem de ataque usando essa arma, você aplica o efeito de especialização de crítico da arma; se necessário, utilize sua CD de magias divinas.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.n9W8MjjRgPpUTvWf]{Quinta Doutrina (15º Nível)}: Suas graduações de proficiência em ataques de magia e CDs de magias divinas aumentam para mestre.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.DgGefatQ4v6xT6f9]{Doutrina Final (19º Nível)}: Suas graduações de proficiência em ataques de magia e CDs de magias divinas aumentam para lendário.

Zb7DuGbFoLEp0H1K.name: Quinta Doutrina
Zb7DuGbFoLEp0H1K.description:
Você ganha o quinto benefício da sua doutrina:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.n9W8MjjRgPpUTvWf]{Sacerdote Enclausurado}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.kmimy4VOaoEOgOiQ]{Capelão da Guerra}

ZjwJHmjPrSs6VDez.name: Archwizard's Spellcraft
ZjwJHmjPrSs6VDez.description: You command the most potent arcane magic and can cast a spell of truly incredible power. You gain a single 10th-level spell slot and can prepare a spell in that slot using arcane spellcasting. You can't use this spell slot for abilities that let you cast spells without expending spell slots or that give you more spell slots. Unlike with other spell slots, you don't gain more 10th-level spells as you level up, though you can take the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tP26mgaFPpr6df1i]{Archwizard's Might} feat to gain a second slot.

Zp81uTBItG1xlH4O.name: Terceira Doutrina (Capelão da Guerra)
Zp81uTBItG1xlH4O.description:
You gain expert proficiency with your deity's favored weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll using that weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect; use your divine spell DC if necessary.

ZqwHAoIZrI1dGoqK.name: Infusões Perpétuas
ZqwHAoIZrI1dGoqK.description:
Você aprendeu a criar infusões alquímicas perpétuas que podem compor um suprimento quase infinito de alguns itens simples.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.DFQDtT1Van4fFEHi]{Infusões Perpétuas (Bombardeiro)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.fzvIe6FwwCuIdnjX]{Infusões Perpétuas (Cirurgião)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Dug1oaVYejLmYEFt]{Infusões Perpétuas (Mutagenista)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LlZ5R50z9j8jysZL]{Infusões Perpétuas (Toxicologista)}

ZvfxtUMtfIOLYHyg.name: Scoundrel Racket
ZvfxtUMtfIOLYHyg.description:
You use fast-talking, flattery, and a silver tongue to avoid danger and escape tricky situations. You might be a grifter or con artist, traveling from place to place with a new story or scheme. Your racket is also ideal for certain reputable professions, like barrister, diplomat, or politician.

When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against melee attacks you attempt against it until the end of your next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all melee attacks until the end of your next turn, not just yours.

You're trained in Deception and Diplomacy. You can choose Charisma as your key ability score.

acqqlYmti8D9QJi0.name: Storm Order
acqqlYmti8D9QJi0.description:
You carry the fury of the storm within you, channeling it to terrifying effect and riding the winds through the sky.

You are trained in Acrobatics. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UpEjRfQkCJCruAfb]{Storm Born} druid feat. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ho1jSoYKrHUNnM90]{Tempest Surge} order spell, and you increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Polluting the air or allowing those who cause major air pollution or climate shifts to go unpunished is anathema to your order. (This doesn't force you to take action against merely potential harm to the environment or to sacrifice yourself against an obviously superior foe.)

aiwxBj5MjnafCMyn.name: Primeira Doutrina (Sacerdote Enclausurado)
aiwxBj5MjnafCMyn.description: Você recebe o talento de clérigo @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Iniciado no Domínio}.

au0lwQ1nAcNQwcGh.name: Arcane Bond
au0lwQ1nAcNQwcGh.description: You place some of your magical power in a bonded item. Each day when you prepare your spells, you can designate a single item you own as your bonded item. This is typically an item associated with spellcasting, such as a wand, ring, or staff, but you are free to designate a weapon or other item. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{Drain Bonded Item} free action.

b5rvKZQCfpgBenKJ.name: Instinto do Dragão de Latão
b5rvKZQCfpgBenKJ.description:
Você convoca o furor de um dragão poderoso e manifesta habilidades incríveis. Talvez sua cultura reverencie a majestade dracônica, ou talvez você tenha ganhado sua conexão ao beber ou banhar-se no sangue de um dragão ou após observar um ancião saqueador queimando sua vila. Selecione um tipo de dragão da Tabela 3–4: Instintos de Dragão como o tipo de dragão de seu instinto. Dragões cromáticos tendem a ser malignos, e dragões metálicos tendem a ser bondosos.

TABELA 3–4: INSTINTOS DE DRAGÃO

Dragão Tipo Sopro
Negro Cromático Linha de ácido
Azul Cromático Linha de eletricidade
Verde Cromático Cone de veneno
Vermelho Cromático Cone de fogo
Branco Cromático Cone de frio
Latão Metálico Linha de fogo
Bronze Metálico Linha de eletricidade
Cobre Metálico Linha de ácido
Ouro Metálico Cone de fogo
Prata Metálico Cone de frio

Anátema

Aceitar um insulto pessoal contra você é anátema a seu instinto. Escolha se seu personagem respeita ou abomina seu tipo de dragão. Se o respeitar, desafiar um dragão desses é anátema — se o abominar, fracassar em derrotar um dragão desses que cruzou o seu caminho é um anátema para você.

Fúria Dracônica (Habilidade de Instinto)

Quando estiver em Fúria, você pode aumentar o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 2 para 4 pontos e alterar seu tipo de dano para corresponder com o tipo do sopro de seu dragão em vez do tipo de dano de sua arma ou ataque desarmado. Se fizer isto, sua ação de Fúria adquire os traços arcano e evocação, assim como o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano.

Habilidade de Especialização

Quando usar fúria dracônica, você aumenta o dano adicional de sua Fúria de 4 para 8 pontos. Se tiver especialização em armas maior, aumente o dano de sua Fúria quando usar fúria dracônica de 8 para 16 pontos.

Resistência em Fúria

Você resiste a dano perfurante e ao tipo de dano do sopro de seu dragão.

b8pnRxGuNzG0buuh.name: Primal Spellcasting
b8pnRxGuNzG0buuh.description:
The power of the wild world flows through you. You can cast primal spells using the Cast a Spell activity, and you can supply material, somatic, and verbal components when casting spells. Because you're a druid, you can usually hold a primal focus (such as holly and mistletoe) for spells requiring material components instead of needing to use a material component pouch.

At 1st level, you can prepare two 1st-level spells and five cantrips each morning from the common spells on the primal spell list, or from other primal spells to which you gain access. Prepared spells remain available to you until you cast them or until you prepare your spells again. The number of spells you can prepare is called your spell slots.

As you increase in level as a druid, the number of spells you can prepare each day increases, as does the highest level of spell you can cast.

Some of your spells require you to attempt a spell attack roll to see how effective they are, or have your enemies roll against your spell DC (typically by attempting a saving throw). Since your key ability is Wisdom, your spell attack rolls and spell DCs use your Wisdom modifier.

bAaI7h937Nr3g93U.name: Fighter Expertise
bAaI7h937Nr3g93U.description: Your practiced techniques are hard to resist. Your proficiency rank for your fighter class DC increases to expert.

bBGb1LcffXEqar0p.name: Swift Prey
bBGb1LcffXEqar0p.description: You size up your prey with only a glance. You can use Hunt Prey as a free action if it's your first action of your turn.

beW1OqibVQ3fBvRw.name: Swashbuckler's Style
beW1OqibVQ3fBvRw.description:
As a swashbuckler, you have your own distinctive style that enables you to gracefully handle everyday events and life-or-death situations alike. Choose a swashbuckler's style. This style determines the additional actions you use to gain panache and makes you trained in the skill related to that action. The styles presented in this book are as follows.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.5HoEwzLDJGTCZtFa]{Battledancer Style}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.KBhwFjdptrKyN5EM]{Braggart Style}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Jgid6Ja6Y879COlN]{Fencer Style}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.B7RMnrHwQHlezlJT]{Gymnast Style}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.4lGhbEjlEoGP4scl]{Wit Style}

bv3Qel8v9tpoFbw4.name: Alchemist Armor Expertise (Level 13)
bv3Qel8v9tpoFbw4.description: You've learned how to dodge while wearing medium, light or no armor. Your proficiency ranks for medium armor, light armor and unarmored defense increase to expert.

cD3nSupdCvONuHiE.name: Expert Spellcaster (Level 7)
cD3nSupdCvONuHiE.description:
Bard: Your proficiency ranks for occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

Druid: Your command of primal forces has deepened, empowering your spells. Your proficiency ranks for primal spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

Oracle: The intricacy of your divine power has grown clearer over time. Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

Sorcerer: Your inherent magic responds easily and powerfully to your command. Your proficiency ranks for spell attack rolls and spell DCs for spells of your bloodline's tradition increase to expert.

Witch: You've learned to better control the power your patron has granted you. Your proficiency ranks for spell attacks and spell DCs for your witch spellcasting increase to expert.

Wizard: Extended practice of the arcane has improved your capabilities. Your proficiency ranks for arcane spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

cDnFXfl3i5Z2l7JP.name: Patron's Gift
cDnFXfl3i5Z2l7JP.description:
Your patron grants you the power to command incredible works of magic. You gain a single 10th-level spell slot and can prepare a spell in that slot using witch spellcasting.

Unlike with other spell slots, these spell slots can't be used for abilities that let you cast spells without expending spell slots or abilities that give you more spell slots. You don't gain more 10th-level spells as you level up, though you can take the Patron's Truth feat to gain a second slot.

cFe6vFb3gSDyNeS9.name: Spell Repertoire (Oracle)
cFe6vFb3gSDyNeS9.description:
The collection of spells you can cast is called your spell repertoire. At 1st level, you learn two 1st-level spells of your choice and five cantrips of your choice. You choose these from the common spells from the divine spell list, or from other divine spells to which you have access. You can cast any spell in your spell repertoire by using a spell slot of an appropriate spell level.

You add to this spell repertoire as you increase in level. Each time you get a spell slot, you add a spell of the same level to your spell repertoire. At 2nd level, you select another 1st-level spell; at 3rd level, you select two 2nd-level spells, and so on. When you add spells, you might choose a higher-level version of a spell you already have so that you can cast a heightened version of that spell.

Though you gain them at the same rate, your spell slots and the spells in your spell repertoire are separate. If a feat or other ability adds a spell to your spell repertoire, it wouldn't give you another spell slot, and vice versa.

Swapping Spells in your Repertoire

As you gain new spells in your spell repertoire, you might want to replace some of the spells you previously learned. Each time you gain a level and learn new spells, you can swap out one of your old spells for a different spell of the same level. This spell can be a cantrip. You can also swap out spells by retraining during downtime.

cU2ofQLj7pg6wTSi.name: Research Field
cU2ofQLj7pg6wTSi.description:
Your inquiries into the alchemical nature of the universe have led you to focus on a particular field of research. You might have a degree from a scientific institute, correspond with other researchers in your field, or work as a genius loner. Choose a field of research.

Your research field adds a number of formulas to your formula book; these are your signature items. When using a batch of infused reagents to create your signature items using advanced alchemy, you create three items instead of two. Each time you gain a level, you can swap one of your signature items with another formula in your formula book. This new signature item must be on your research field's list of possible signature items.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.7JbiaZ8bxODM5mzS]{Bomber}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.eNZnx4LISDNftbx2]{Chirurgeon}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.tvdb1jkjl2bRZjSp]{Mutagenist}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.P9quO9XZi3OWFe1k]{Toxicologist}

d5BFFHXFJYKs5LXr.name: Wild Empathy
d5BFFHXFJYKs5LXr.description: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on animals and to make very simple Requests of them. In most cases, wild animals will give you time to make your case.

dKTb959aCQIzSIXj.name: Bloodline: Wyrmblessed
dKTb959aCQIzSIXj.description:
You lay claim to the might of dragons, but your powers are sacred instead of arcane-born from a worship of draconic might so powerful it infused your blood or, perhaps, from a celestial or draconic power blessing one of your ancestors received.

Spell List divine

Bloodline Skills Intimidation, Religion

Granted Spells cantrip: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}; 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}; 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}; 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}; 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mv5L4201uk8hnAtD]{Reflective Scales}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TCk2MDwf5L5OYjFC]{Cloak of Colors}; 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}; 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KtTGLbLG9nqMbUYL]{Divine Inspiration}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{Overwhelming Presence}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws}; advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{Dragon Breath}; greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}

Blood Magic Draconic might carries in your voice. Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.c6yRHikgf6cm7cyB]{Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.nX7fp5pZhTJH6Qfa]{Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)}

Dragon Type

At 1st level, choose the type of dragon that influenced your bloodline. You can't change your dragon type later. This choice affects how some of your bloodline spells function. The good metallic dragons and their damage types are brass (fire), bronze (electricity), copper (acid), gold (fire), and silver (cold).

The evil chromatic dragons and their damage types are black (acid), blue (electricity), green (poison), red (fire), and white (cold).

The primal dragons of planar origin and their damage types are brine (acid), cloud (electricity), crystal (piercing), magma (fire), and umbral (negative).

The imperial dragons and their damage types are forest (piercing), sea (bludgeoning), sky (electricity), sovereign (mental), and underworld (fire).

For the dragon breath focus spell, the area is a 60-foot line for a brine dragon; a 30-foot cone for a cloud, crystal, forest, magma, sovereign, or umbral dragon; and a 10-foot burst within 30 feet for a sea, sky, or underworld dragon.

dU7xRpg4kFd01hwZ.name: Instinto
dU7xRpg4kFd01hwZ.description:
Você canaliza sua fúria através de um instinto. Você decide o que seu instinto significa para você. Ele pode ser uma criatura ou símbolo amado por seu clã ou mesmo uma fonte ou filtro puramente interno de sua fúria — como uma crença, maldição, herança ou estado mental. Cada instinto concede uma habilidade de instinto e mais habilidades que você pode receber através de talentos com o traço instinto. Ele também determina a quais tipos de dano você resiste com sua resistência em fúria e em níveis superiores aumenta o dano adicional causado durante a @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.WZUCvxqbigXos1L9]{Fúria}.

Cada instinto lista atos que são anátemas para ele. Sempre que realizar esses atos, você perde as habilidades do instinto e quaisquer talentos com o traço instinto até gastar 1 dia de recesso centrando-se novamente, embora mantenha suas outras habilidades de bárbaro.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.0FtzFbUrN56KA67z]{Instinto Animal}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.VDot7CDcXElxmkkz]{Instinto de Dragão}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.k7M9jedvt31AJ5ZR]{Instinto do Furor}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JuKD6k7nDwfO0Ckv]{Instinto de Gigante}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.TQqv9Q5mB4PW6LH9]{Instinto Espiritual}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.SCYSjUbMmw8JD9P9]{Instinto de Superstição}

dUMsM0yDTCdV31p6.name: Third Path to Perfection (Fortitude)
dUMsM0yDTCdV31p6.description:
Você alcançou um grande progresso em seus estudos pessoais para a iluminação.

Escolha uma das jogadas de salvamento que você tenha selecionado para caminho para a perfeição ou segundo caminho para a perfeição. Sua graduação de proficiência para a jogada de salvamento escolhida aumenta para lendário. Quando rolar uma falha crítica no salvamento escolhido, trate o resultado como uma falha. Quando rolar uma falha em um salvamento do tipo escolhido contra um efeito que causa dano, divida o dano sofrido pela metade.

dmK1wya8GBi9MmCB.name: Skillful Lessons
dmK1wya8GBi9MmCB.description: At 3rd level and every odd-numbered level thereafter, you gain a skill feat. This feat must be for an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill, or for the skill you gained from your methodology.

eG7FBDjCdEFzW9V9.name: Alchemical Mastery
eG7FBDjCdEFzW9V9.description: Your alchemical concoctions are incredibly effective. Your proficiency rank for your alchemist class DC increases to master.

eNZnx4LISDNftbx2.name: Chirurgeon
eNZnx4LISDNftbx2.description:
Você se concentra em curar os outros com alquimia. Você começa com duas fórmulas adicionais em seu livro de fórmulas, em adição as suas outras fórmulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ktjFOp3U0wQD9t0Z]{Antídoto (Menor)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UqinuuCWePTYGhVO]{Antipeste(Menor)}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{Elixir da Vida (Mínimo)}.

Seu campo de pesquisa adiciona um número de fórmulas em seu livro de fórmulas; estes são seus itens emblemáticos. Ao usar um lote de @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Reagentes Infundidos} para criar seus itens emblemáticos usando @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Alquimia Avançada}, você cria três itens ao invés de dois. Cada vez que você ganha um nível, você pode trocar um de seus itens emblemáticos por outra fórmula do seu livro de fórmulas. O novo item emblemático deve estar na lista de possíveis itens emblemáticos do seu campo de pesquisa.

Enquanto sua graduação de proficiência em Medicina for treinado ou melhor, você pode realizar um teste de Manufatura em vez de Medicina para quaisquer usos destreinados e treinados de Medicina.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.qC0Iz6SlG2i9gv6g]{Descoberta de Campo de Pesquisa}Nível 5

Quando usar alquimia avançada para criar elixires de vida durante suas preparações diárias, você pode usar um lote de reagentes para criar três elixires em vez de apenas dois.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.fzvIe6FwwCuIdnjX]{Infusões Perpétuas}Nível 7

Você aprendeu a criar infusões alquímicas perpétuas que podem compor um suprimento quase infinito de alguns itens simples. Você adquire a habilidade de criar dois itens alquímicos de 1º nível usando @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Alquimia Rápida} sem gastar um lote de reagentes infundidos. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

Antídoto menor e antipeste menor.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.VS5vkqUQu4n7E28Y]{Potência Perpétua}Nível 11

Você aprimora suas infusões perpétuas, conseguindo usar Alquimia Rápida para criar itens mais poderosos sem custo. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AJ1dC7EtTIfBey0M]{Antídoto} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.biRbqKo2C97XLfQ0]{Antipeste} moderado.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JJcaVijwRt9dsnac]{Descoberta de Campo de Pesquisa Maior}Nível 13

Quando usar Alquimia Rápida para criar qualquer tipo de elixir de vida, a criatura que beber o elixir recebe o máximo de Pontos de Vida possíveis para o elixir em vez de rolar os dados para determinar a quantidade de Pontos de Vida recuperados.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.YByJ9O7oe8wxfbqs]{Perfeição Perpétua}Nível 17

Você aperfeiçoou suas infusões perpétuas, permitindo-lhe usar Alquimia Rápida para criar itens ainda mais poderosos sem custo. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antídoto} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ORDaAzMZLrf6Hn8A]{Antipeste} maior.

eW3cfCH7Wpx2vik2.name: Bloodline: Fey
eW3cfCH7Wpx2vik2.description:
Fey whimsy or a tryst in a moonlit grove put the bewitching magic of the First World into your family's bloodline.

Spell List primal

Bloodline Skills Deception, Nature

Granted Spells cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tlSE7Ly8vi1Dgddv]{Hideous Laughter}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TCk2MDwf5L5OYjFC]{Cloak of Colors}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{Mislead}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jBGAYmR0BkkbpJvG]{Visions of Danger}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Jvyy6oVIQsD34MHB]{Uncontrollable Dance}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KPDHmmjJiw7PhTYF]{Resplendent Mansion}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mBojKJatf9PTYC38]{Fey Disappearance}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DdXKfIjDtORUtUvY]{Fey Glamour}

Blood Magic Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.rJpkKaPRGaH0pLse]{Effect: Fey Blood Magic}

eZNCckLzbH3GyncH.name: Shield Block (Level 1)
eZNCckLzbH3GyncH.description: You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} general feat, a reaction that lets you reduce damage with your shield.

ehL7mnkqxN5wIkgu.name: Deity and Cause
ehL7mnkqxN5wIkgu.description: Champions are divine servants of a deity. Choose a deity to follow; your alignment must be one allowed for followers of your deity. Actions fundamentally opposed to your deity's ideals or alignment are anathema to your faith. A few examples of acts that would be considered anathema appear in each deity's entry. You and your GM determine whether other acts are anathema. You have one of the following causes. Your cause must match your alignment exactly. Your cause determines your champion's reaction, grants you a devotion spell, and defines part of your champion's code.

ejP4jVQkS48uKRFz.name: Weapon Fury
ejP4jVQkS48uKRFz.description: Your rage makes you even more effective with the weapons you wield. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attacks increase to master.

ejmSQOJR5lJv1pzh.name: Rune Patron
ejmSQOJR5lJv1pzh.description:
Your patron is one of sigils and symbols, tomes and texts, words and wisdom.

Spell List arcane

Patron Skill Arcana

Hex Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.UmXhuKrYZR3W16mQ]{Discern Secrets}

Granted Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Magic Weapon}

f3Dh32EU4VsHu01b.name: Rogue Expertise
f3Dh32EU4VsHu01b.description: Your techniques are now harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your rogue class DC increases to expert.

fEOj0eOBe34qYdAa.name: Occult Spellcasting
fEOj0eOBe34qYdAa.description:
You draw upon magic from esoteric knowledge. You can cast occult spells using the Cast a Spell activity, and you can supply material, somatic, and verbal components when casting spells. Because you're a bard, you can usually play an instrument for spells requiring somatic or material components, as long as it takes at least one of your hands to do so. If you use an instrument, you don't need a material component pouch or another hand free. You can usually also play an instrument for spells requiring verbal components, instead of speaking.

Each day, you can cast up to two 1st-level spells. You must know spells to cast them, and you learn them via the spell repertoire class feature. The number of spells you can cast each day is called your spell slots.

As you increase in level as a bard, your number of spells per day increases, as does the highest level of spells you can cast.

Some of your spells require you to attempt a spell attack roll to see how effective they are, or have your enemies roll against your spell DC (typically by attempting a saving throw). Since your key ability is Charisma, your spell attack rolls and spell DCs use your Charisma modifier.

fEwVQUXUgUqTk4sE.name: Tempest Mystery (Multiclass)
fEwVQUXUgUqTk4sE.description:
The fury of the wind and waves pounds in your heart, whether your power flows from natural storms, a conduit to the elemental Planes of Air and Water, or through reverence of deities such as Gozreh, the tengu god of storms Hei Feng, the demon lord Dagon, or the elemental lords of air and water.

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

fRifyINZF5SKDfib.name: Armor Expertise (Level 11)
fRifyINZF5SKDfib.description: You have spent so much time wearing armor that you know how to make the most of its protection. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor, as well as for unarmored defense, increase to expert. You gain the armor specialization effects of medium and heavy armor.

fdVLlFI1SyD7QGtu.name: Flames Mystery (Multiclass)
fdVLlFI1SyD7QGtu.description:
Fire lives at the center of the world, the center of the sun, and the center of civilization. You might revere this elemental force, siphon power from the Elemental Plane of Fire, or venerate a collection of deities such as Asmodeus, Sarenrae, the Tian goddess of disasters and volcanoes Lady Nanbyo, or the elemental lord of fire Ymeri.

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

feCnVrPPlKhl701x.name: Bloodline Paragon
feCnVrPPlKhl701x.description: You have perfected the magic in your bloodline. Add two common 10th-level spells of your tradition to your repertoire. You gain a single 10th-level spell slot you can use to cast these spells, using sorcerer spellcasting. Unlike other spell slots, you don't gain more 10th-level spells as you level up, and they can't be used for abilities that let you cast spells without expending spell slots or abilities that give you more spell slots. You can take the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6SEDoht4dXEJE5SW]{Bloodline Perfection} sorcerer feat to gain a second slot.

flEx8eY0NinF9XZU.name: Master Detective
flEx8eY0NinF9XZU.description:
As a master detective, you can solve any case and find all the clues available. If you're pursuing the subject of a lead and you enter a new location that includes another clue toward solving the mystery, the GM informs you of the existence of the clue and its type: an object, person, spell effect, or the like.

When you find the clue, the GM informs you that you've done so. If there is more than one clue in the location, the GM chooses one to inform you about. When you find any of the clues in that location, the GM informs you that you've done so, even if it wasn't the clue they'd chosen or there are other clues you haven't found.

Your proficiency rank for your investigator class DC increases to master.

fykh5pE99O3I2sOI.name: Champion Code
fykh5pE99O3I2sOI.description:
You follow a code of conduct, beginning with tenets shared by all champions of an alignment (such as good), and continuing with tenets of your cause. Deities often add additional strictures (for instance, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.sZrdzh0ANQnZGXJb]{Torag} champions can't show mercy to enemies of their people, making it almost impossible for them to follow the redeemer cause). Only rules for good champions appear in this book. Tenets are listed in order of importance, starting with the most important. If a situation places two tenets in conflict, you aren't in a no-win situation; instead, follow the more important tenet. For instance, as a paladin, if an evil king asked you if you're hiding refugees so he could execute them, you could lie to him, since the tenet against lying is less important than preventing harm to innocents. Trying to subvert your code by creating a situation that forces a higher tenet to override a lower tenet (for example, promising not to respect authorities and then, to keep your word, disrespecting authorities) is a violation of the champion code.

If you stray from your alignment or violate your code of conduct, you lose your focus pool and divine ally until you demonstrate your repentance by conducting an @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual, but you keep any other champion abilities that don't require those class features. If your alignment shifts but is still one allowed by your deity, your GM might let you retrain your cause while still following the same deity.

fzvIe6FwwCuIdnjX.name: Infusões Perpétuas (Cirurgião)
fzvIe6FwwCuIdnjX.description:
Você aprendeu a criar infusões alquímicas perpétuas que podem compor um suprimento quase infinito de alguns itens simples.

Você adquire a habilidade de criar dois itens alquímicos de 1º nível usando @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Alquimia Rápida}sem gastar um lote de reagentes infundidos. Você deve selecionar itens apropriados ao seu campo de pesquisa e eles devem constar em seu livro de fórmulas.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ktjFOp3U0wQD9t0Z]{Antídoto Menor} e @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UqinuuCWePTYGhVO]{Antipeste Menor}.

g3mNzNphtVxyR9Xr.name: Empiricism Methodology
g3mNzNphtVxyR9Xr.description:
Everything comes down to data. Calculating statistics, running numbers, and using inductive reasoning allows you to determine the most likely outcome of any scenario, and anything out of place draws your keen attention.

You are trained in one Intelligence-based skill of your choice. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pIHjH1x0AVtiX5Tv]{That's Odd} investigator feat, and you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.jftNJjBNxp2cleoi]{Expeditious Inspection} free action.

gApJtAdNb9ST4Ms9.name: Fighter Weapon Mastery
gApJtAdNb9ST4Ms9.description: Hours spent training with your preferred weapons, learning and developing new combat techniques, have made you particularly effective with your weapons of choice. Choose one weapon group. Your proficiency rank increases to master with the simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attack in that group, and to expert with the advanced weapons in that group. You gain access to the critical specialization effects of all weapons for which you have master proficiency.

gCwcys8CnS102tji.name: Arcane School: Abjuration
gCwcys8CnS102tji.description: As an abjurer, you master the art of protection, strengthening defenses, preventing attacks, and even turning magic against itself. You understand that an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure. You add one 1st-level abjuration spell (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}) to your spellbook. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Ward} school spell.

gU7epgcPSm0TD1UK.name: Defensive Robes (Level 13)
gU7epgcPSm0TD1UK.description: The flow of magic and your defensive training combine to help you get out of the way before an attack. Your proficiency rank in unarmored defense increases to expert.

gblTFUOgolqFS9v4.name: Divine Font
gblTFUOgolqFS9v4.description:
Through your deity's blessing, you gain additional spells that channel either the life force called positive energy or its counterforce, negative energy. When you prepare your spells each day, you can prepare additional @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spells, depending on your deity. Once you choose, you can't change your choice short of an ethical shift or divine intervention.

Healing Font: You gain additional spell slots each day at your highest level of cleric spell slots. You can prepare onlyhealspells in these slots, and the number of slots is equal to 1 plus your Charisma modifier.

Harmful Font: You gain additional spell slots each day at your highest level of cleric spell slots. You can prepare onlyharmspells in these slots, and the number of slots is equal to 1 plus your Charisma modifier.
